description:
Luffy`s shadow is forced into the body of a monster, Usopp and Chopper get incinerated, and Nami is kidnapped by a zombie who wants to make her his wife!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 500年ぶりの目覚め!! オーズ開眼!!
Awakening After 500 Years!! Oars Opens His Eyes!!
Un sommeil long de 500 ans ! Oz ouvre les yeux !
Пробуждение после пятисот лет! Оз открыл глаза!
